text: The Suva-Nausori corridor is made up of 3 municipalities of Suva, Nasinu and Nausori. The Suva-Nausori corridor host two roads – Kings Road is the main road and Ratu Dovi Road which travels from Suva to Laqere. The poles of the Suva-Nausori corridor are Suva and Nausori and they are about 19 km apart. Rewa River from the New Rewa Bridge Category:Suva
title: Suva-Nausori corridor
